item.description:
EVENT IS AT SATURDAY AT 7PM!!!

Come join good company and meet new people to watch the great new movie 'Capitalism: A Love Story' by Michael Moore! Bring snacks or drinks if you so desire. We will go out for drinks afterwards!

Tom will contact you with the exact location after you register!



About the movie:

On the 20-year anniversary of his groundbreaking masterpiece "Roger & Me," Michael Moore's "Capitalism: A Love Story" comes home to the issue he's been examining throughout his career: the disastrous impact of corporate dominance on the everyday lives of Americans. But this time the culprit is much bigger than General Motors, and the crime scene is far wider than Flint, Michigan.

See the trailer: http://www.michaelmoo...
item.how_to_find_us: Tom will contact you with the location after you register!
item.name: 'Capitalism: A Love Story' Movie Party
